content: the sahab tee is a simple top down design worked with a round yoke the optional stitch patterning seed stitch is created with just knits and purls to create a fun and easy texture the fingering weight yarn combined with a larger gauge creates a light and airy shirt for your little ones to enjoy full youtube tutorial available https //youtu be/lwgbnxbl0c4 sizes 0-3mo 6-12mo 12-18mo 18-24mo gauge 22 sts & 38 row = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette finished measurements blocked yoke depth 3 75 4 25 4 5 4 75 inches / 9 5 11 11 5 12 cm chest circumference 16 5 19 5 23 24 inches 42 49 5 58 5 61 cm body length including short row 7 8 5 9 10 inches / 18 21 5 23 25 5 cm sleeve length 1 75 2 2 25 2 75 inches/ 4 5 5 5 5 7 cm yarn approximately 70 80 90 95 grams or 270 308 346 375 yards / 245 280 315 340 meters of fingering weight yarn needles us 2 5 3mm needles with 16 inch cord and 32 inch or longer cord for magic loop us 6 4mm needles with 16 inch cord and 32 inch or longer cord for magic loop notions scrap yarn or stitch holders tapestry needle 1 stitch marker email kaaburaknits@gmail com for pattern support
